title: Colonial Bungalow on Gegory's Lake Front For Sale
details:
Bristish Period Colonial Bungalow in Nuwara Eliya
Bungalow with 2.5 acres of large land around the bungalow
Bungalow is just above the upper lake road and with the full view of the lake
Lake has been recently developed all around and the value of the property has been further enhanced
Bungalow is in the original colonial style and well maintained by a in house staff regularly
Ideal investment opportunity and opportunity to developed further as a villa or large resort in the city
